objects.specification: A flat floor plane with a subtle earthy tile texture inspired by prehistoric cave floors, featuring a matte finish and natural color variations for an immersive dinosaur classroom ambiance.
A smooth vertical front wall covered in a themed mural of lush jungle foliage and dinosaur silhouettes, finished with a slight texture to evoke an ancient environment.
A vertical back wall textured with a soft leafy pattern and earth-toned decals, evoking prehistoric plant life and providing a backdrop for educational materials.
A side wall with a textured wallpaper showing fern patterns and subtle dinosaur footprints, giving a sense of depth and exploration.
A side wall adorned with educational chart decals of dinosaur skeletons and landscapes, printed on a matte surface to reduce glare.
A large teacher's desk with a rich woodgrain finish and sturdy A-frame legs, featuring a slightly distressed surface texture for a rugged, natural look.
A large rectangular blackboard with a dark matte surface framed in reclaimed wood, providing a clear writing area and fitting the classroom's rustic theme.
A rectangular student desk with an earthy wood finish and rounded corners, featuring metal supports under the tabletop for durability.

children.specification: A small realistic dinosaur skeleton model with articulated bones, mounted in an upright pose to showcase prehistoric anatomy.

objects.specification: A large, highly detailed T-Rex model with lifelike skin textures, muscular definition, and a dynamic posture that evokes realistic movement.
A large, highly detailed Triceratops model with textured horns and frill, realistic skin patterns, and a stable four-legged stance.
A small wooden bookshelf with four evenly spaced shelves, filled with colorful dinosaur-themed books and field guides, showing slight wear for authenticity.
A brightly colored educational poster depicting various dinosaur species with labels and illustrated prehistoric landscapes, printed on matte paper.
